response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional performance, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $12,000 to you. Considering its worth to both us and you, I'm offering it to you for $14,000. This is a special offer tailored specifically for you, taking into account its importance to your operations. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 14000}
